---

#### Declarations diff

`+ instance : CoeSort (PresheafedSpace C) Type* where coe X := X.carrier`
`- instance : CoeSort (PresheafedSpace C) Type* where coe := fun X => X.carrier`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

I like this style: I do not think that this is specifically encouraged by the style guide, but I am happy to

maintainer merge

this PR!

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - style: replace `coe := fun x =>` by `coe x :=` and similar
